document_data.name: Druidic
document_data.mainbody: '''Druidic''' was the secret language of [[druid]]s.<ref name=PH-p35>
document_data.Speakers: All druids were taught Druidic, and they were forbidden to teach the language to anyone who was not a druid.<ref name=PH-p35/>
document_data.Script: Druidic made use of its own alphabetic script.<ref name=PH-p35/>
document_data.Sublanguages: Druidic was actually a language subgroup composed of two distinct but similar languages. The vast majority of druids spoke '''Drueidan'''; those from the [[Moonshae Isles|Moonshaes]] spoke a language called '''Daelic'''.<ref name=D:SiT>{{Cite dragon/Speaking in Tongues|28}}
document_data.History:
Drueidan was developed by a powerful group of druids who worshiped [[Silvanus]]. Silvanus made an agreement with the other nature gods of the [[Faerûnian pantheon]] to allow druids all over [[Faerûn]] to speak it.<ref name=D:SiT/>

Daelic, on the other hand, was developed by druids who worshiped the [[Earthmother]].<ref name=D:SiT/>
